website_summaries.verdict: An ergonomic stool that provides plenty of comfort and support and alleviates back pressure.
pros: Comes with superb hypoallergenic and waterproof upholstery
but is capable of supporting up to 550 lbs
Small cell foam seat is dense and plush
Designed for comfort, stability and longevity
cons: Bulky stool may be too big and too wide for some people to sit comfortably

customer_reviews.title: Great if You Are Tall
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction, but the seat adjustment does not lower enough. The average seat height for a chair is around 18 inches. This seat only lowers to 20.5 inches. When sitting on this stool your legs are straddled like sitting in a saddle. This reduces your leg reach to the floor. As a hair stylist, I have purchased and used many stools over the past 30 years and never encountered a stool that does not lower to 15 or 16 inches. I am 5' 3.5" with a 28" inseam and this seat is not comfortable. I think you would have to be at least 5' 6" to use this stool.
customer_reviews.author: Happy in Jax

customer_reviews.title: Encourages proper posture
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used this stool for a day. So far I love it. This stool encourages you to sit upright with your pelvis rocked forward making it very hard to slouch. If I change my mind about how awesome this is, I’ll update my post. The seat is wider than a typical seat. I’ve excluded a side by side image of my old stool 13 inches across and the new one.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chair for a dental hygienist like me
customer_reviews.text: Awesome chair for a dental hygienist like me! I'm 5" tall and had to lean over so much to see-killing my back!! Now I'm able to scoot more easily under my patients head and leaning is greatly diminished! Happy Happy!
customer_reviews.author: tradercountry.com

customer_reviews.title: This chair is perfect for keeping your core engaged while sitting for long ...
customer_reviews.text: This chair is perfect for keeping your core engaged while sitting for long periods of time in front of a computer. I purchased two of them; one for my office at work and one for my home office. This change in office chairs may have been one of the most pivotal things I could have done to save my back and pelvic dysfunction.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Taylor

customer_reviews.title: THINK TWICE BEFORE YOU PURCHASE IF YOU’RE A RDH OR DENTIST
customer_reviews.text: The saddle itself is very nice! I’m a registered dental hygienist. I stupidly bought this saddle stool trying to avoid the cost of one made for dental professionals. Now, 2 years later I’m paying for tons of chiropractic and massage therapy bills because this stool messed up my psoas muscle. You cannot get close enough to the patient with this and it causes terrible ergonomic habits. Now I’m getting a crown saddle seat and spending the money I tried to avoid to begin with...don’t be cheap. Learn from my mistake and get the good stool made for our profession.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Greco

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made and wheels broke off first week
customer_reviews.text: Horribly made. I had tried a $900 Hager saddle chair for a whole month. It was amazing and my back felt great! But my boss said no way and I tried this one. Uncomfortable and wheels snapped off and i almost fell out of the chair. I'll be getting the $900 Hager saddle chair from Patterson dental and will be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. John Carter

customer_reviews.title: Sewing Chair
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect solution for a sewing chair. It allows me to easily pivot between my machine and ironing board, improves my posture, and eliminates the issue of seat edge pressing against my upper leg. Only regret is not buying it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: carrie gallagher

customer_reviews.title: What all Professional Pet Groomers need!!!
customer_reviews.text: Has great cushion and seat seems firm enough as well like it is going to hold up for a long time. Rolls well on the vinyl floor at the shop I work at. The stool will go low enough I can get under my grooming table nicely without having to slump over while I’m grooming. I have fibromyalgia and my back really flares up while grooming and this stool really helps with keeping a correct sitting posture.
customer_reviews.author: Erica C.

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: This rolling chair is the best quality! It’s much larger than most rolling chairs which I love. The quality is superior and you can definitely tell it will last year’s and years. Everyone at work wants to use it whenever I am not. UPDATE: The wheels on this chair are tearing up my cushioned mat that I previously stood on. The wheels are made a little differently than other wheels and I’m so sad. I’ll probably use this is my massage/waxing room and purchase another one for hairstyling while on the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gave me hemorrhoids/hernia whatever a bloodcot is that goes through the pelvic floor.
customer_reviews.text: The seller and quality is good. No disrespect. But to those prone to hemorrhoids/hernia or whatever a bloodclot that goes through the pelvic floor is. Then avoid this type of chair. After sitting on this I got worse hemorrhoids than ever before. Fortunately I found a doctor to push the bloodclot back through the soft tissue that it went through. But it was the worst pain ever. Again, I don't think the seller knew about this possibility. Just a suggestion for somehow upgrading the next design for those people with weak pelvic floors like me.
customer_reviews.author: JustACasual

customer_reviews.title: ... been using this saddle chair for 3mons and I love it. The chair makes me sit ergonomically correct ...
customer_reviews.text: Im a dental hygienist and I have been using this saddle chair for 3mons and I love it. The chair makes me sit ergonomically correct and I have no more back pain. The chair also allows me to sit closer to the patient. Overall im happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slopes downwards
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this exact saddle once before, and it had a lip at the back that prevented you from sliding off. This one, in comparison, is strictly a downward slope. In conjunction with its wide lip, I was falling backwards out of the saddle and my back was actually having more pressure placed on it. Not sure if they changed the production style or what, but very unsatisfied with this saddle now. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: JenM

customer_reviews.title: but it's really great for a little movement
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly as it says it is. I use this at my desk. Make sure it's either a very tall desk, or an adjustable standing desk if that's your use case because its shortest setting is a little too tall for a 30" desk. I can't quite use it all day and switch out with an alera ET4218 full susupension chair, but it's really great for a little movement, stretching, etc. I figured that when I bought it. It's a Quality item, I'm just using it way beyond the intended period of time as an attorney.
customer_reviews.author: K. Pitchford

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable! Great padding!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and very comfortable! I am a dental hygienist and sit on this daily! I purchased a saddle chair for triple the price one year ago and I love this one way more! And it costs less! It does get a little warm/stores heat when sitting, but VERY nice padding and very comfortable!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony A.

customer_reviews.title: This is going to take some getting used to...
customer_reviews.text: the stool doesn't match the picture used in the ads...especially the drawing. It is nearly flat and is much wider than I expected it to be. The saddle part is so low that its a wasted feature...and takes some maneuvering to even get comfortable (one in every four tries). The wheels do not work on carpet without a great deal of effort; going to have to put down some heavy duty plastic in the hallway. Otherwise, it is well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Bydnmytime

customer_reviews.title: Not good if you're tall and skinny
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6ft and on the thin side. The saddle is far too wide and uncomfortable on the groin area. May suit some people but not for me; wasted of money.
customer_reviews.author: Bong

customer_reviews.title: RDH approved
customer_reviews.text: I'm an RDH and I was having back pain and just straining myself with the chair provided in my dental office. This is such a great buy! My DDS is now ordering it for his office.
customer_reviews.author: Mj

customer_reviews.title: It took me about a day to adjust and I love it. I had seen these in salons and ...
customer_reviews.text: This does just what I wanted - swivels smoothly, wheels work well, and the construction seems to support the 550 lb. load claim. It took me about a day to adjust and I love it. I had seen these in salons and thought they would work well for me in my office. They do, and I couldn't be happier.. The only surprise I had was the size. The ones I had seen in the salons looked like very large bicycle seats. This model will give you thoughts of saddles, and horses. It's not a problem. I was just surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Halverson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty wide seat base
customer_reviews.text: Pretty wide seat base, even for my husband. If you are looking for something that keeps your legs spread a lot while sitting then this one is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Brickford

customer_reviews.title: Fine Chair, Poor Warranty Service from Master Massage
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this saddle as a home office chair. Works fine. Only used maybe 10 hours a week. Had a seam open up along an edge, not a random hole in the middle, during the saddle warranty period. Contacted the manufacturer and was told they would warranty if I paid for shipping the old part back, and for shipping the new part to me. Informed them that their warranty policy said that they would pay shipping on the new part. They responded that since I purchased from Amazon that they would now Not warranty the product, it was Amazon's problem, but I could gladly purchase the new part from them. Fine stool, Poor Warranty Service from Master Massage.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S

customer_reviews.title: Would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I am a dental hygienist. I have this chair for two month now. I have to say... it is very comfortable, sturdy, easy rolling, light weight chair. It forces me to sit straight up, and I noticed less tension in my upper back area. I can finally keep my elbows where they should be( ergonomics).
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Sciatic nerve pain from wide hump/seat
customer_reviews.text: Bought this chair in May, and after months of using it I started having horrible sciatic nerve pain. Took me a while to figure out it was from this saddle chair. Since I stopped using it my pain has gone away. The seat is just too wide and the hump too big causing sciatic nerve pain. Overall qood quality, comfortable cushion but not for me, I’m 5’7” so maybe it’s better for a bigger person.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish it held up a bit better.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the chair. Been using it for a year now. Seam ripped which has me not want to get another. But it was good while it lasted. Seems like a poor choice of placement for the seam to fall since it is taking the weight of the body.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Get this chair
customer_reviews.text: Use it everyday. Took a little bit to get used to sitting like this, but it's very comfortable now. Very sturdy, very well built and very light to move from room to room when needed. The lever in the back of the chair is a non-issue for me. Get this chair!
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Provencher

customer_reviews.title: too wide for me
customer_reviews.text: had to return it. The seat was so WIDE. If you are a smaller woman, pass on this one and look carefully at the dimensions of the other saddle seats.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good!, highly recommend this
customer_reviews.text: I am a skincare specialist!!and I work over clients!! This has helped me to sit up tall and not kill my back anymore!!! Very good !,highly recommend this! It does take time to get use too though.
customer_reviews.author: deanna watkins

customer_reviews.title: Great stool!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stool. I keep it at my office and it feels and fits better than a regular flat stool. If you're a massage therapist looking for a new stool, go with this one. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sully

customer_reviews.title: only 3 pieces and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly, only 3 pieces and easy to assemble. The quality was good, however the seat is too wide to be comfortable. Impossible to use if wearing a skirt. Unfortunately, it was impossible to disassemble, therefore I couldn’t return it.
customer_reviews.author: APaesan

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Like it a lot, other then the up and down paddle is in the middle of the back of the stool, which makes it difficult to reach and use while setting on it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Wide saddle for my frame
customer_reviews.text: The saddle was a bit wide for my frame. I'm 5'7 and I wish the frame of the seat was a bit smaller... But it's so much better than a regular seat. I use it while I do art and my clients use it when I cut there hair... It's very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a desk chair. I'm 5'1" and my regular desk chair gave me leg and back pain. This chair solved that problem. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: annette pedersen

customer_reviews.title: Back in the saddle again....
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair for computer work. It rolls super easy, is sturdy, and is comfortable for long stretches 'in the saddle' . It came in just two pieces and took 3 second to put together. Good packaging. It is a little bit wide, and it would be great to see some options in width from the company. Other than that, I'd highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: cobaltblue

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a 13 year old rolling stool that didn't function properly anymore. I was so excited when this stool came in! It was comfortable, easily moved up and down, rolled around on the floor smoothly, AND it made a huge difference in my posture/neck/back/arm strain! Love this stool!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Big! Wow! And comfortable! Mine has white wall wheels and moves silently on my tile floor. First stool had a bum shock and seller shipped new one the next day! Height adjustment also silent. Perfect for massage!
customer_reviews.author: jerod kiger

customer_reviews.title: The saddle is really large
customer_reviews.text: I really tried to make this stool work for me. I'm 5'2' and weight 110 pounds. The saddle was so wide, it stretched my adductor muscles to the point of injury. Seriously. I'm on my way to a sports doctor now to figure out how I'm going to deal with it. If you're large, maybe this stool will work for you. It just hurt me. And, it was impossible to take apart to send back. Beware!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal for sitting for long periods of time
customer_reviews.text: Not ideal chair for lashing but the saddle is pretty hard.. sitting for 2+ hours a day isnt ideal.. i get up and im sore between my leg
customer_reviews.author: MaryLeighN

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.text: The wheels are stiff and don’t roll freely. The base is a hard plastic, I think I’d prefer a metal base. The seat is very comfortable, but difficult to raise or lower with the handle in the back.
customer_reviews.author: T.Dockter

customer_reviews.title: good until piston started to slip...
customer_reviews.text: Started using this saddle chair June 30, 2018. It is used 4 days a week for approximately 5-7 hours per day. Over the past month, the piston has begun to slip and therefore, the seat sinks; the lever is not touched and no movement is being made while the piston slips and sinks. Would love to have this problem resolved. Very comfortable seat.
customer_reviews.author: docs

customer_reviews.title: Fixed my posture
customer_reviews.text: I work in an office and sit for 8+ hours a day. I have a standing desk to relieve some of the pressure from sitting, but I still wasn't enjoying my time sitting. I bought this chair to see if it helped with my back pain and it did! Before, I was cracking my back AT LEAST three times per hour. Now, I noticed that I'm no longer slouching and no longer feel the need to crack my back. This chair looks a little weird in an office setting, but it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Medrano

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. Helps a lot with reducing back issues while lashing my clients. Helps me keep my posture
customer_reviews.author: Me23

customer_reviews.title: The adjustment lever is in the rear! Where you can't reach it unless you're a contortionist!
customer_reviews.text: And you can't turn it around the other way, either. VERY BAD DESIGN DECISION!!
customer_reviews.author: Yet Another Gomez Addams

customer_reviews.title: Love love love !
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace ball chair on wheels (tired of replacing balls). And I like it so much better. I have used for 6 - 8 months now it makes me sit up straight at my desk and the bonus for me is my knees are not stiff when I get up. Like this so much just bought a second one for my craft room!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: God for esthetician’s
customer_reviews.text: Good for esthetician’s, I’m current eyelash artist. Every client takes usually about two hours, my back is ok, because legs is lower then on regular stool
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable sitting position to work at bench level. Easy to glide to different working stations. Easier to sit on than a standard chair. Does not cause any back discomfort
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Really cut down on my back pain. I purchased two for my sewing room. Very comfortable and they roll around with little effort. Seem to be extremely sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: gofergulch

customer_reviews.title: Giddyup, horsie!!
customer_reviews.text: It's relatively comfortable. A little hard to get used to. Like flinging your leg up and over a horse! The lever to raise and lower is behind you so that is a struggle to adjust. I guess it's just the getting on and off that takes some time to figure out. Glides easily on my laminate flooring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the right fit for me but great quality
customer_reviews.text: It was very uncomfortable for me. The seat is extremely firm. I think cushion would be better for me. The quality and assembly is great just not right for me.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: if you like a padded seat...
customer_reviews.text: This isn't it. It's a perfect height for my desk. However, it is definitely hard on the buns after an hour. It has helped with lower back pain.
customer_reviews.author: J. Miles

customer_reviews.title: large foot print
customer_reviews.text: Awesome chair, has greatly improved my posture and back issues. As other reviews mentioned, the seat has a large diameter. It is great for me, the only other thing to know is this would not work well for a woman wearing a skirt, you need to have pants on this unless you want to flash everyone. Great value for the price, and quite helpful for my lower back problems!
customer_reviews.author: Rory M.

customer_reviews.title: Better than any massage stool!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this stool for 2(+) months now at my Massage office. It is extremely comfortable. Typically massage stools are flat topped and just “ok” which is why I never purchased one. After I injured my knee during a workout I was unable to do an air squat while working my clients necks. I finally decided to get a stool, and I love this! Every massage therapist and lash tech that has seen it immediately sits on it with the intent of telling me that I paid too much for it...instead they asked me to send them the link for them to buy one too!
customer_reviews.author: Wellness From Within

customer_reviews.title: Soft and wide
customer_reviews.text: The seat is much wider than I expected and the upholstery is pretty soft. I am curious to see how well it holds up with repeated use
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P. Feagins

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: easy to use and well made. well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: White Wolf

customer_reviews.title: hurts like #$%
customer_reviews.text: i have use it for 2 weeks and it butt. i put is away for few weeks and then try it away. same results. i will be giving it goodwill, for what use is it sit here in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great starter saddle chair!
customer_reviews.text: Let's me get really close to the patient without feeling like they're in my personalife space (if you know what I mean) can get a little sore like riding a bike after sitting in it all day. Overall great chair for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Although it did not go as high as I originally ...
customer_reviews.text: Although it did not go as high as I originally hoped, its been amazingly durable and even more than similar stools that were twice the price. Wipes clean, and keeps its shape.
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this chair. Very good quality. I am 6' and I do lash extensions so, it was very hard for me to find a chair I thought would work for me. I will post again about long time sitting comfort
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Cook

customer_reviews.title: Forces good posture, sits very comfortably
customer_reviews.text: Had this chair for 8 months now and don’t think I could use another one anytime soon. Forces good posture, sits very comfortably. Being a tattooer, this has really helped with back issues by not allowing me to slouch and distort in weird positions. If you sit for long periods, this chair is a dream. Highly recommend!! Perfect transaction as well!!
customer_reviews.author: DermalArtist

customer_reviews.title: I'm a dental hygienist and love this stool
customer_reviews.text: I'm a dental hygienist and love this stool! I've had it a few weeks and already noticed my back feels better!!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Gagner

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stool. I work in a dental office and I wish I would have purchased this long time ago! Very easy to put together and seems like a quality product. Would buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly E

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily and not very adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: All in all, an ok sitting position, but not but the height is adjustable. After 4 months of light-average usage, the hydraulic cylinder began to malfunction, and in the fixed position, now moves up and down to a high degree. When I pull the handle now, to adjust it, the seat has to be manually pulled upward.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Koener

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic chair! Glad I bought this!!!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is awesome! Very comfortable! Super easy to move about! Absolutely hands down worth the money!! Super soft!!!
customer_reviews.author: C.Peavy

customer_reviews.title: Great for Esthetician
customer_reviews.text: This chair has definitely changed how my back feels during my facial sessions with my clients. This was definitely a great investment
customer_reviews.author: Honar Saleem

customer_reviews.title: Cheap asf.
customer_reviews.text: Wheel popped off within a week. Waste of money. Also not comfortable for lashing. I’m an eyelash tech and it is so uncomfortable half way through my 10 hour days
customer_reviews.author: Kaila Boston

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair!
customer_reviews.text: I use at my desk and drafting table and it’s super comfortable and helps you sit up straight relieving lower back pain My husband borrows it when I’m not using it because he likes it so much.
customer_reviews.author: J. Korth

customer_reviews.title: the perfect craft room chair
customer_reviews.text: the best chair for using my sewing machine and crafts room
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved the stool... but 2 months in and the hydraulic no longer works
customer_reviews.text: Loved the stool... have only had it 2 months and the hydraulic no longer works - if you set it to the tallest setting it immediately slides to the lowest setting each time used. Very disappointed - hoping there is a way to repair.
customer_reviews.author: Tia Verseman

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for 6 months of super light use
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months of light use when I sit on it it slides all the way down. Worthless
customer_reviews.author: Saba

customer_reviews.title: Sits comfortably
customer_reviews.text: This seat helped as my wife sits at a desk all day long in a normal office type chair, typing all day and it caused her hips to hurt. This provided a way to stretch out and sit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: David Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Big seat
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, the girth is alot bigger than imagined.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Im very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I checked reviews and watched video that makes me decide to purchase this stool. Im very happy with it. As a dental hygienist, it prevents me from slouching and helps keep me neutral spine. Also, it moves very smoothly without any noise and cushion is very comfortable. Thanks for sharing and video
customer_reviews.author: Michael Noh

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm and is comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom who has a bad back. She uses it in her kitchen all the time when cooking and baking. Save her from having to bend Omer all the time
customer_reviews.author: Janet Benedict

customer_reviews.title: really love 💕 it
customer_reviews.text: At first very, uncomfortable, but after I got use to it, really love 💕 it. Really helps my back.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie K

customer_reviews.title: Not working anymore
customer_reviews.text: Bought mine aug 2018 it now does not stay in place it begins to slowly go down to the lowest height.....wondering if it can be fixed and who to contact about this.
customer_reviews.author: Tanja

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice saddle stool with very wide saddle, which is great for me. Very competitive price and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Terao

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife that is a dental hygienist and she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Ddelo29

customer_reviews.title: but it is comfortable
customer_reviews.text: To wide on the front to me, but it is comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Vero de la Garza

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, made well, very soft and cushy but supportive. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Miss

customer_reviews.title: YES!
customer_reviews.text: I use this chair in my sewing room. It is wonderfully comfortable for sewing. I'm not sure whether it's simply the change from a regular chair or whether the chair actually helps posture. It certainly moves freely. It is also tremendously versatile. I can raise the chair to sit at my craft table (significantly higher than my sewing table) where, again, I find the change in sitting position easier on my back. I highly recommend this chair. In fact, I plan to buy a couple more. One for upstairs at my desk and another for the second sewing table in my sewing room.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Good but bulky
customer_reviews.text: As a dental hygienist helped my lower back pain for sure. Improves ergonomics. A little too bulky though.
customer_reviews.author: mary hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Helps with back pain
customer_reviews.text: I like this chair better than the regular chairs used in the dental office.
customer_reviews.author: Kiara S Rucker

customer_reviews.title: Loses Air
customer_reviews.text: I've bought two of these and both of them slowly sink as you sit on them. Its so darn frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: IronMAn

customer_reviews.title: Wheels break easily
customer_reviews.text: The chair is very comfortable, Just what I was looking for BUT, the wheels started breaking after the FIRST HOUR of use. VERY CHEAP PLASTIC BASE AND WHEELS,
customer_reviews.author: jjohnson

customer_reviews.title: Definitely pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Definitely pleased with my purchase. My low back pain has dissipated immensely since using this saddle stool. I would highly recommend it to others who sit for long periods at a time at a desk!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Set up was extremely easy. High quality
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Set up was extremely easy. High quality. Extremely comfortable and easy to use in salon.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Troxell

customer_reviews.title: Nice stool!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sturdy stool. It's a back saver for me....
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: ASSEMBLEY LESS THAN 2 MINUTES!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly took about 1 minute! VERY comfortable chair, rolls well and is very sturdy and high quality!
customer_reviews.author: Danica

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have health issues that make it difficult to stand for any length of time. This stool is making it possible for me to be productive in the kitchen again.
customer_reviews.author: deez nuts

customer_reviews.title: ... new chair for the 1st time and I really like it! It's going to help my posture and ...
customer_reviews.text: Just used my new chair for the 1st time and I really like it! It's going to help my posture and make my work much easier to do!
customer_reviews.author: GrapeApe

customer_reviews.title: Great stool for massage therapy.
customer_reviews.text: I love this stool. Perfect positioning at any level, and very comfortable! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Johnson

customer_reviews.title: ... am a dental hygienist and this stool has been great to reduce fatigue on my lower back
customer_reviews.text: I am a dental hygienist and this stool has been great to reduce fatigue on my lower back, neck, shoulders. I wish I had bought it sooner! I may purchase one for my desk at home too.
customer_reviews.author: Carmi Thompson

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my husband's work and he absolutely love it. Says that his posture is straighter and he can sit longer than he could before. He's very happy with this stool.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Kelker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, no complaints.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, so happy I went with this one. My office has bought 2 others on Amazon and I went with this one. Now, everyone tries to steal it. So, out of the 3 we bought on Amazon. This is the best one. So comfortable. I use it with my convertable standing desk when I sit.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I'm not happy with this seat. I watch a video you guys put on Amazon that showed the foam wrapping around the wood and a big square base that would last longer than a skinny one. The foam doesn't wrap around the wood and the base is skinny just like the one you said not to buy! Also! the handle to move the seat up and down is in the back! So I have to twist my body all the way around AND reach under the seat to move it! It's not a $100 chair is a $40 chair.
customer_reviews.author: shelley scott

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This stool is way too wide .. don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Buck3

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it. I am so glad I ordered!
customer_reviews.author: Toni Hooper

customer_reviews.title: Also the seat is very comfortable to sit on
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for our daughter who is a hair dresser. She loves how low it goes. She is very tall & this chair saves her back. Also the seat is very comfortable to sit on. She Loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Evans

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: You will not regret purchasing this chair. I absolutely love it. It took me 1 minute to put it together. It’s very sturdy and moves with ease! Worth every penny.!!!
customer_reviews.author: Velicia Carter

customer_reviews.title: "Saddle" curves up too much at the back - too much pressure on the sacrum/tailbone
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well padded so my sit bones are happy BUT horribly uncomfortable overall! This seat is contoured in such a way that the back of the "saddle" curves up quite a bit. It causes enough butt pressure that it applies upward force to my sacrum/tailbone area, and generates shooting pains in my tailbone area and down my legs. IF IT FITS YOUR SHAPE, this is extremely well padded and *should* be comfortable. For me, it's (sadly!) a non-starter.
customer_reviews.author: Experimental Adventurer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy on my wife's back when she's doing hair, good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: its a well made chair that I love. shipped quick in great condition when I received ...
customer_reviews.text: had knee surgery needed in the shop so I could go back to work quickier. its a well made chair that I love. shipped quick in great condition when I received it. would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kandy Winsette

product_meta.title: Master Massage Ergonomic Swivel Saddle Rolling Hydraulic Comfortable Adjustable Stool in Black for clinic spas beauty salons debtists classrooms home office
product_meta.description: Master Massage engineers designed this stool for better comfort and design—its saddle nature eases painful pressure on the back. The 2.5” Exclusive Multi-Layer Small Cell foam is specially molded around the seat base, rather than simply glued on. The Master Ergonomic Adjustable Saddle Stool boasts a large, comfortable 360° swivel seat, soft Rollerblade-like Polyurethane wheels (safe for hardwood floors and carpet), and hypoallergenic durable upholstery. The seat's PU upholstery is hypoallergenic, CFC-free and oil and waterproof backed by a 5 year guarantee, making it perfect for dozens of workplaces and professions. Each element of the stool has been engineered for comfort, stability and longevity. PERFECT for professionals and for at home use.Pneumatic-Lift Mechanism – same as high-end office chairs!
feature_bullets: Saddle seat design for more comfort and support to the spine by reducing painful pressure on the back.
Features pneumatic-lift mechanism. Seat Diameter(L x W): 18 x 16 inches and full 360° rotation
Features 2.5” of our Exclusive Multi-Layer Small Cell Foam
The hypoallergenic, CFC-free, oil and waterproof upholstery is backed by a 5 year guarantee.
Adjustable height of 20.5” to 27.5”; Weighs 11lbs but supports 550lbs.
